description: This quick pea puree pairs beautifully with your main course.
keywords: Sauce & condiment,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Pea Puree Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a non-stick pot to a medium heat with the butter.
Cook the peas with the butter and 1 mint leaf for 3 minutes until cooked.
Remove from the heat, allow to cool slightly and transfer to a blender.
Blitz in a blender for 30 seconds and serve with salt and pepper to taste.
